about.name: Abu Dhabi
about.info_text: Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, is a modern and culturally rich city located on the Arabian Gulf. It is known for its impressive skyline, stunning architecture, and a blend of tradition and innovation. With its vast deserts, pristine beaches, and a vibrant cultural scene, Abu Dhabi offers a diverse array of experiences for residents and visitors. The city is also home to world-class museums, luxurious hotels, and a thriving food scene.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 1.6 million
Emirate: Abu Dhabi
Time Zone: Gulf Standard Time (UTC+04:00)
Language: Arabic, English
Currency: United Arab Emirates Dirham (AED)
about.climate_text: Abu Dhabi has a desert climate with hot and dry summers and mild winters. It experiences minimal rainfall and plenty of sunshine throughout the year, making it an ideal destination for sun-seekers.

attractions_card.title: Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque
attractions_card.description: The Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque is one of the world's largest and most magnificent mosques, known for its stunning architecture and intricate design.

attractions_card.title: Louvre Abu Dhabi
attractions_card.description: Louvre Abu Dhabi is a renowned art and civilization museum, featuring a diverse collection of art and artifacts from around the world.

attractions_card.title: Emirates Palace
attractions_card.description: Emirates Palace is a luxurious hotel and a cultural landmark, known for its opulent design and beautiful beachfront location.

attractions_card.title: Ferrari World Abu Dhabi
attractions_card.description: Ferrari World is an indoor amusement park that houses the world's fastest roller coaster and various Ferrari-themed attractions.

attractions_card.title: Qasr Al Watan
attractions_card.description: Qasr Al Watan is the Presidential Palace, known for its stunning architecture and the opportunity to explore its grand halls and gardens.

attractions_card.title: Corniche Beach
attractions_card.description: The Corniche is a beautiful waterfront area with a well-maintained beach, parks, and a lovely promenade for leisurely walks.

attractions_card.title: Yas Island
attractions_card.description: Yas Island is an entertainment hub with attractions like Yas Waterworld, Yas Marina Circuit, and Yas Mall for shopping and fun.

attractions_card.title: Heritage Village
attractions_card.description: The Heritage Village is a cultural attraction that offers insights into the history and traditions of the United Arab Emirates.

food_card.title: Shawarma
food_card.description: Shawarma is a popular Middle Eastern street food made with roasted meat, typically served in pita bread with vegetables and tahini sauce.

food_card.title: Biryani
food_card.description: Biryani is a flavorful and aromatic rice dish cooked with spices, herbs, and your choice of meat or vegetables.

food_card.title: Hummus
food_card.description: Hummus is a creamy dip made from chickpeas, tahini, olive oil, and various seasonings, often served with pita bread.

food_card.title: Falafel
food_card.description: Falafel is a popular vegetarian dish made from deep-fried balls or patties of ground chickpeas or fava beans, often served in pita bread.

food_card.title: Mandi
food_card.description: Mandi is a traditional Arabic rice and meat dish cooked with a blend of spices, often served with grilled chicken or lamb.

hotels_card.title: The St. Regis Abu Dhabi
hotels_card.description: The St. Regis offers luxurious accommodations, stunning views of the Arabian Gulf, and a signature butler service.

hotels_card.title: Emirates Palace
hotels_card.description: Emirates Palace is not just a hotel but an iconic landmark, providing opulent rooms, private beaches, and top-tier dining.

hotels_card.title: Yas Hotel Abu Dhabi
hotels_card.description: Yas Hotel is a contemporary and unique hotel located on Yas Island, offering marina views and access to attractions like Yas Waterworld and Ferrari World.

hotels_card.alt: Shangri-La Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi
hotels_card.title: Shangri-La Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi
hotels_card.description: Shangri-La is a luxury resort located along the Grand Canal, featuring traditional Arabian architecture and world-class facilities.

hotels_card.title: Khalidiya Palace Rayhaan by Rotana
hotels_card.description: Khalidiya Palace offers a beachfront setting, well-appointed rooms, and a range of dining options to suit various tastes.

transport_card.title: Abu Dhabi Metro
transport_card.description: The upcoming Abu Dhabi Metro is set to provide a convenient and modern public transportation system within the city.

transport_card.title: Taxis
transport_card.description: Taxis are a common mode of transportation in Abu Dhabi, with a fleet of air-conditioned vehicles readily available.

transport_card.title: Abu Dhabi International Airport
transport_card.description: Abu Dhabi International Airport (AUH) is the primary airport serving the city and offers a range of international and domestic flights.
